record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - January 29, 2008)

[Page: S454]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the privilege of the floor be extended to Colin Jones, a fellow with my office, for the duration of my speech today.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that David Walker, a fellow, be given the privilege of the floor for this legislative day.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
